channel.title: Hey, Raul here, creator of imgOptimize
channel.description:
I've been a developer for around 10 years. A few years ago, I started to get entrepreneurial with GDocsOpen (double click to open any office document in google docs). That didn't work out that well, I made the product free.
For almost a year, I am the proud owner of imgOptimize, a utility that shaves extra bytes in images, without affecting the image's quality.
Currently working on biz-eye.com, a notification system regarding different web metrics (like blacklists, page rank, and so on)

item.title: Hey, Raul here, creator of imgOptimize
item.dc:creator: ra00l
item.description:
I’ve been a developer for around 10 years. A few years ago, I started to get entrepreneurial with GDocsOpen (double click to open any office document in google docs). That didn’t work out that well, I made the product free.

For almost a year, I am the proud owner of imgOptimize, a utility that shaves extra bytes in images, without affecting the image’s quality.

Currently working on biz-eye.com, a notification system regarding different web metrics (like blacklists, page rank, and so on)
